original_title: All Dogs Go to Heaven: Friends to the Rescue
overview: Join Charlie (voiced by Steven Weber) and his canine friends Itchy (Dom DeLuise), Anabelle (Bebe Neuwirth) and Sasha (Sheena Easton) on another round of hair-raising adventures in this collection of episodes from the popular animated series, based on the 1989 Don Bluth film. A foursome of episodes focusing on the theme of friendship includes "Field Trip," "Cyrano de Barkinac," "Mutts Ado About Nothing" and "Heaventh Inning Stretch."
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven: Friends to the Rescue
